title: Susedia
overview: László and his wife Ildikó move into the apartment building of František and Zuzana. Neither František, László's best friend, nor Zuzana are enthusiastic at first. Only Marta is excited about this, who sees it as an opportunity to find a partner. And when their children Milka and Gergely return ... Thanks to the constant problems of one or the other family, they often meet.
